name: Call of the Abyss
description:
Call of the Abyss is a rogue-like card game inspired by anime such as Made in Abyss. You have a long way to go, descending into the abyss. Explore the depths of this world, defeat mysterious enemies and find unexplainable things.

Game Features:
A vast abyss with an intriguing story;
Unique collectible cards and their upgrades;
Artifacts, potions, and other things to help you in the abyss.
